Ross Jeffcoat
About Work Produced
RETURN

WOLF PACK

Jan 1, 2023 promo merch OOH digital packaging

CREATIVE BRIEF

Wolf Pack is an American supernatural teen drama television series created by Jeff Davis for Paramount+, based on the 2004 book of the same name written by Edo van Belkom. The series premiered on Paramount+ on January 26, 2023.

I was assigned to produce the key art with the return of Sarah Michelle Geller as well as the promo design and animation.
